patthana15.57:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.57:0.3_0: Next there are bartered in the skillful,
patthana15.57:1.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion is a condition for the unskillful.
patthana15.57:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.57:2.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. ...
patthana15.57:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.57:2.1_3: (This should be expanded as for the three roots of the following.)
